good.currentHeadline: Operations Manager at ABC Construction | Federal Contractor
good.aiHeadline: Construction Operations Leader | Helping Government Contractors Streamline Operations | 15+ Years Driving Efficiency

profileData.name: John Davis
profileData.headline: Operations Manager at ABC Construction | Federal Contractor
profileData.about: I'm a construction operations professional with over 15 years of experience. When I'm not managing projects, I enjoy golf and spending time with my family. I specialize in helping government contractors optimize their operations and win more contracts. I've helped over 50 companies secure their first federal contracts.

fixes.title: Banner Optimization
fixes.description: Your banner could showcase more social proof. Add awards, contract values, or company logos.
fixes.tips: Include your branding colors, a tagline, and any awards or achievements.

fixes.title: About Section Enhancement
fixes.description: Your about section is good but could include more metrics and specific accomplishments.
fixes.tips: Add specific numbers - contracts won, revenue generated, clients helped.

fixes.title: Features Section
fixes.description: Add a features section to showcase case studies or awards.
fixes.tips: Include case studies of contract wins, awards, or certifications.

average.aiHeadline: Federal Business Development Strategist | Connecting Government Contractors with Opportunities | $50M+ in Contracts Secured

fixes.title: Headline Needs Work
fixes.description: Your headline is too generic and doesn't communicate value. It needs to be catchy and specific.
fixes.tips: Use ChatGPT to generate options. Include who you help and what problem you solve.

fixes.title: About Section Missing
fixes.description: Your about section is missing or too short. It should blend personal and professional elements.
fixes.tips: Start with who you are personally, then transition to what you do professionally. Include metrics.

fixes.title: No Banner
fixes.description: You're using the default LinkedIn banner. Create a custom one with branding and value proposition.
fixes.tips: Use your branding colors, include a tagline, and add logos of companies you work with.

fixes.title: Profile Picture
fixes.description: Your profile picture may not be optimized. Ensure it's clear, professional, and uses branding colors in background.
fixes.tips: Use shoulder-up framing, solid background (preferably branding colors), and make sure it looks like you.

fixes.title: Show Connections
fixes.description: Your connections count should be visible to build trust.
fixes.tips: Go to Settings → Visibility → Connections and enable visibility.

fixes.title: Get Endorsements
fixes.description: You have few or no endorsements. This reduces credibility.
fixes.tips: Endorse others in your network - it's reciprocal. When someone endorses you, thank them.

fixes.title: Request Recommendations
fixes.description: You don't have recommendations. These add significant credibility.
fixes.tips: Ask people you've worked with for recommendations. Give recommendations to others.

fixes.title: Add Website
fixes.description: No website link in your profile. Make it easy for people to learn more.
fixes.tips: Add your website or landing page in the contact information section.

fixes.title: Enhance Experience
fixes.description: Your experience section lacks detail. Add accomplishments and metrics.
fixes.tips: Don't just list job titles - describe accomplishments, include metrics, highlight what makes each role unique.

fixes.title: Content Strategy
fixes.description: You're not posting regularly. Content builds authority.
fixes.tips: Post 3-5 times per week. Share industry news, contract wins, and educational content.

fixes.title: Engagement Strategy
fixes.description: You're not engaging with others' content. This reduces visibility.
fixes.tips: Spend 30 min - 1 hour daily commenting on posts from your target audience before posting your own.

fixes.title: Personal Connection
fixes.description: Your profile lacks personal elements. People want to connect with YOU.
fixes.tips: Share hobbies, interests, or background. People want to connect with you, not just your business.

fixes.title: Call-to-Action
fixes.description: No clear call-to-action in your profile.
fixes.tips: Include a clear call-to-action in your about section - website, calendar link, or how to reach you.

fixes.title: Skills Section
fixes.description: Your skills section needs work.
fixes.tips: Add relevant skills and endorse others to get endorsed back.

fixes.title: Certifications
fixes.description: Display relevant certifications to add credibility.
fixes.tips: Add certifications and licenses to add credibility.

fixes.title: Network Building
fixes.description: You need to connect with more people in your target audience.
fixes.tips: Connect with decision-makers, government officials, and other entrepreneurs in your industry.

fixes.title: Case Studies
fixes.description: Share contract wins and success stories.
fixes.tips: Post case studies showing results. You don't always need to name the client.

fixes.title: Engage with Own Posts
fixes.description: Like and comment on your own posts to start engagement.
fixes.tips: Be the first to like your post and add a comment to start engagement.

fixes.title: Features Section
fixes.description: Add a features section to showcase your work.
fixes.tips: Include case studies, awards, certifications, or your newsletter in the features section.

fixes.title: Newsletter
fixes.description: Consider starting a newsletter to build your audience.
fixes.tips: A newsletter helps you own your audience and provides value to your network.

poor.aiHeadline: Strategic Problem Solver | Transforming Complex Business Challenges into IT Solutions | 20+ Years Delivering Results

fixes.title: No Headline
fixes.description: Your headline is completely missing. This is critical for LinkedIn visibility.
fixes.tips: Create a headline that clearly states your value proposition and who you help.

fixes.title: No About Section
fixes.description: Your about section is empty. This is one of the most important parts of your profile.
fixes.tips: Write a comprehensive about section that blends personal and professional elements.

fixes.title: Default Profile Picture
fixes.description: You're using LinkedIn's default profile picture. This hurts your credibility.
fixes.tips: Use a clear, professional photo with shoulder-up framing and a solid background.

fixes.title: No Banner
fixes.description: You're using the default banner. Create a custom one.
fixes.tips: Use your branding colors, include a tagline, and add social proof.

fixes.title: No Connections Visible
fixes.description: Your connections count is hidden. This reduces trust.
fixes.tips: Go to Settings → Visibility → Connections and enable visibility.

fixes.title: No Experience
fixes.description: Your experience section is empty or incomplete.
fixes.tips: Add your work experience with detailed accomplishments and metrics.

fixes.title: No Endorsements
fixes.description: You have no endorsements. This significantly hurts credibility.
fixes.tips: Endorse others in your network - it's reciprocal. People will endorse you back.

fixes.title: No Recommendations
fixes.description: You have no recommendations. These are crucial for credibility.
fixes.tips: Ask people you've worked with for recommendations. Give recommendations to others.

fixes.title: No Website
fixes.description: No website link. Make it easy for people to learn more.
fixes.tips: Add your website or landing page.

fixes.title: No Content
fixes.description: You're not posting any content. This reduces visibility.
fixes.tips: Start posting regularly - 3-5 times per week. Share industry news and insights.

fixes.title: No Engagement
fixes.description: You're not engaging with others' content.
fixes.tips: Spend time daily commenting on posts from your target audience.

fixes.title: Small Network
fixes.description: You have very few connections. Build your network strategically.
fixes.tips: Connect with decision-makers, government officials, and industry professionals.

fixes.title: No Skills
fixes.description: Your skills section is empty.
fixes.tips: Add relevant skills to your profile.

fixes.title: No Certifications
fixes.description: No certifications displayed.
fixes.tips: Add certifications and licenses to add credibility.

fixes.title: No Location
fixes.description: Location not specified. This helps local connections find you.
fixes.tips: Add your location to help local connections find you.

fixes.title: No Features
fixes.description: No features section. Showcase your work.
fixes.tips: Add case studies, awards, or other achievements to your features section.

fixes.title: No Call-to-Action
fixes.description: No clear way for people to contact or work with you.
fixes.tips: Include a clear call-to-action in your about section.

fixes.title: Generic Profile
fixes.description: Your profile is very generic and doesn't stand out.
fixes.tips: Add personal elements, specific accomplishments, and make it unique to you.

fixes.title: No Authority Building
fixes.description: You're not building authority in your niche.
fixes.tips: Share expertise, insights, and position yourself as an expert in your field.

fixes.title: Complete Overhaul Needed
fixes.description: Your profile needs a complete optimization overhaul.
fixes.tips: Follow all the recommendations above systematically. Start with headline and about section.
